author: Totally Not Mark
description:
NEW POSTER! https://totallynotmark.com/

Dragon Ball Daima was an incredible series that, for one reason or another, didn’t fully connect with a wider audience. Despite that, it was filled with infectious charm and genuinely strong character writing, and principal writer Yuko Kakihara was clearly working under heavy constraints. In Part 2, we’re taking another look at Daima and exploring what it could have been. With the help of some incredible artists, sound designers, and our friends over at Team Four Star, we’ve been able to bring Act 1 to a close!

title: Dragon Ball MAGIC (feat. @TeamFourStar ) Pt. 2
